segments.text: Good morning , sir , where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to England by flight B . E . 987 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 10:00 a . m . When am I supposed to check in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are checking in . May I have your ticket ? And your health certificate and your luggage , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you keeping this small bag as carry-on luggage , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must weigh that as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your luggage is two pounds over , I am afraid there'll be an excess luggage charge , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is your luggage check , which you must show when you disembark at your destination , and here is your boarding pass and your ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now please wait until your flight is called . There are about twenty-five minutes to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a little nervous . I have never flown before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is nothing at all to worry about . Once you're in the air , it's just like sitting in your own living room . It's going to be a very pleasant flight .
segments.speaker: S1
